name: Room To Heaven
description:
Room to Heaven

This is my entry for the LD37.

Hello challenger, can you reach the Heaven?

In this videogame, you have to defeat different waves of enemies in order to reach the top of the world. You can take one power-up before each round to make it easier.

Controls

WASD / Arrows - Movement
Left Shift - Run
Spacebar - Jump
Mouse - Camera
Mouse Left Click - Shoot
Escape - Pause

I made it in 30h, thanks for playing and hope you like it!
